title: Twitter no longer lets users access the chronological timeline by default [U: Rolled Back]
content:
Twitter was heavily criticized when it switched from the chronological timeline to the new feed that shows suggested tweets instead. The social network then created an option so that users could always see recent tweets by default, but this is no longer the case. A new Twitter update no longer lets users access the chronological timeline by default.

moreâ€¦

The post Twitter no longer lets users access the chronological timeline by default [U: Rolled Back] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Twitter has decided to roll back the update that removed the option to access the timeline in chronological order by default.
